InformationStage.main: Have you been learning English for a long time but you are still afraid to speak it? Or waiting for the ‚Äùright moment‚Äù? If you want to be fluent one day, you need to make practicing English your habit NOW! 👊🏻 Good news: you‚Äôre not alone with this anymore. Now you have US! Our community will help you connect with people who have the same language goals as you. Only together you will be able to develop your speaking and listening skills! And, who knows, maybe you even become friends in real life! So, how exactly does it all work? It‚Äôs not all rocket science! All you need to do is join any /available meeting you like (which can be either /offline or /online). If there‚Äôs nothing that catches your eye, you can always /create your own meeting by choosing date, time, place, English level and number of people. See, you can be your own boss here 😎 However, some people are shy to initiate a meeting. If you don‚Äôt consider yourself very shy, try taking the first step and /create a meeting! You will help a lot of peers out this way! Let's get started!

HelpStage.main: Hey! Here are some useful commands that might help you find your perfect meeting. Information /faq - frequently asked questions /catalogue - meeting's topics catalogue /version - version of the bot and changelog info Meetings /active - show all available meetings /online - show all available online meetings /offline - show all available offline meetings /archived - show all expired (archived) meetings /my - show my schedule meetings Actions /create - create new meeting Good luck! 😉

UndefinedStage.unknown: Oops! I‚Äôm sorry I don‚Äôt understand this command 🥴 You can find the list of available commands here: /help ‚ú®

‚òù🏻Template.
Using template (plain text) to create new meeting.

‚úå🏻Step by step.
Create new meeting by answering questions about meeting details.

TopicMeetingCreationSBSStage.input: It‚Äôs always better to choose the topic of the meeting beforehand. This way you will be able not only to review your vocabulary and prepare the words you may need to use. But also spend a pleasant time in an engaging conversation without making any awkward pauses‚Ä¶ Trust me, I know what I‚Äôm talking about! 😏 You can choose one of the random topics from our catalogue or come up with your own. What would you like to talk about?

FormatMeetingCreationSBSStage.input: Hmmm...🤔 What exactly is ‚ÄòMeeting format‚Äô? Let‚Äôs see! It means the place where you want to get in contact with your speaking partners. ‚Ä¢ For online meetings our community uses Skype calls so, please, make sure, that you have this program on your device. ‚Ä¢ Offline meetings take place in the ‚Äôreal life‚Äô. It can be your favorite caf√© or just bench in a park (so far only Minsk is being supported). So it‚Äôs really up to you to decide! 😌 Which option do you prefer?

Don‚Äôt hesitate and join the next available meeting! 🤟🏻

WelcomeStage.intro: Welcome to our community! 🤗 It‚Äôs nice to meet you! Let‚Äôs improve your speaking skills together! 😈 All necessary information you can find in /info section!

IntroStartMeetingCreationStage.main: Wow! You‚Äôre really motivated to speak English! We‚Äôre happy to see that kind of eager from you! 😈 Creating a meeting is actually easier than you might think! And it won‚Äôt take much of your time either. You can find all related information here. Right now we‚Äôre going to ask you a few questions and see what your perfect meeting looks like. Just follow the tips on the bottom of each message ‚¨áÔ∏è After you create a meeting, everyone in the community group will receive a notification, so that they can join you later. And REMEMBER: Practice makes perfect! 💪

ContactsStage.main: Are you experiencing any problem using the bot or want to see some improvements? We would like to hear your suggestions! Please, contact me @privetyaolega 🤙 You can become a part of our community by simply joining our community chat 🤗 Also invite your friends and practice English together! Meeting new people can be a little bit overwhelming‚Ä¶ Seeing a familiar face will help you release all the pressure. Even if you already feel confident, it‚Äôs more fun with friends anyway! ‚ò∫

SupportUsStage.main: We‚Äôre not commercial. However, if you want to see this project improve, we accept donations. All the donated money will go on advertising, maintenance and improvements so that more people can find out about our community 💪 It will also increase your chances to meet a like-minded person and become really good friends! 🤗 All payment information you can find here
